## Type of Enhancement
- [ ] New content quality standard
- [ ] New hook/automated check
- [ ] New template
- [ ] Industry/content-type specific rules
- [ ] Install script improvement
- [ ] Other

## Describe the Feature
What content quality capability would you like to add?

## Rationale
Why is this valuable? What content problem does it solve?

## Evidence/Sources
Link to best practices, research, or industry standards supporting this feature.

## Proposed Implementation
If you have ideas, describe:
- File location
- Rule/hook/template content
- When it should trigger

## Alternatives Considered
Other approaches you've thought about.

## Additional Context
Examples, references, or prior art.
